occupation: Senior Sql Database Administrator at Confidential
headline: Senior SQL Database Administrator | 4x Azure Certified | Cloud Migration Engineer | Performance Tuning | Backup & Recovery
summary:
🛠️ Seasoned SQL DBA with 6 years of hands-on experience in database development, administration, supporting and independently migrating/upgrading critical production servers.

🔄 Proficient in setting up high availability and DR solutions from scratch, including Always On, log shipping, mirroring, and replication, ensuring seamless operations.

🔍 Exceptional troubleshooting skills and expertise in handling L3 escalations and performance tuning  on SQL servers, resolving performance issues, and ensuring optimal database functionality and response times.

📏 Extensive knowledge of stored procedures, index optimization, and query tuning contributing to enhanced database performance and efficiency.

🚀 Demonstrated experience in supporting all versions of SQL Server, showcasing adaptability and comprehensive understanding of the evolving SQL environment.

📑 Proven track record in change management, documentation, and reporting, ensuring audit compliance and seamless migration of databases from on-premises to cloud environments.

📊 Extensive experience in managing and migrating associated SSRS, SSIS, and SSAS applications and reports, contributing to comprehensive database management and reporting capabilities.

📏 Well-versed in patching, database sizing, and planning, demonstrating a strong grasp of disaster recovery processes and health monitoring dashboards.

🚀 Highly skilled in ensuring the stability and performance of databases, coupled with a robust understanding of Azure SQL Database administration, making a strong fit for Senior SQL Database Administrator and Azure SQL Database Administrator roles.

🏢 Managed, mentored, and oversaw a team of 5 members as a DBA track lead, fostering a collaborative and productive work environment.

🏆 Recognized with the best employee award for three quarters, reflecting client satisfaction with my performance and contributions to the organization's success.

✉️ Email: Adarsh.patz@gmail.com
📃 References will be provided upon request.

experiences.title: Database Consultant
experiences.description:
> Upgraded On-Prem SQL servers to SQL 2019 version and seamlessly migrated to Azure cloud.
> Optimized database performance and ensured high availability by performing comprehensive performance tuning and implementing cutting-edge solutions.
> Contributed to disaster recovery planning and participated in disaster recovery testing to mitigate potential risks.
> Collaborated with the DevOps team to integrate and troubleshoot solutions, resulting in enhanced operational efficiency and productivity.
> Conducted in-depth capacity planning to ensure optimal database performance and scalability, aligning resources to business needs.
> Quickly identified and resolved issues related to database slowness, minimizing downtime and maximizing system efficiency.
> Migrated SSIS, SSRS, and SSAS to the new environment with minimal disruption, ensuring seamless integration with existing systems and minimizing impact on business operations.

experiences.title: Associate Database Engineer
experiences.description:
> Demonstrated strong comprehension of cloud architecture and design patterns for cloud database solutions.
> Implemented and managed Azure SQL Database and Azure SQL Managed Instance, ensuring high availability and disaster recovery solutions.
> Conducted thorough testing and validation of cloud migration projects, ensuring data integrity and performance.
> Worked with teams to plan and execute database migrations, including data migration, schema migration, and configuration changes.
> Configured Azure Database Migration Service (DMS) and Azure Site Recovery (ASR) to automate disaster recovery and migration processes.
> Implemented security measures, including encryption, authentication, and authorization, for cloud database solutions.
> Utilized tools such as Rubrik, Azure DevOps, ServiceNow, and Jira to streamline and optimize IT operations.

experiences.title: Senior Systems Engineer
experiences.description:
> Led database design, implementation, and migration projects, ensuring smooth transition and minimal disruption to business operations.
> Leveraged T-SQL programming and database optimization expertise to design and implement highly performant databases with optimized indexing strategies and maintenance plans.
> Designed and implemented high availability and replication solutions, such as Always On and Clustering, ensuring maximum system availability and minimizing risk of data loss.
> Mentored and coached junior team members, fostering a positive and productive work environment, resulting in enhanced team collaboration and individual growth.
> Streamlined daily refreshes by automating critical operations, resulting in a 60% reduction in workload and reduced manpower.
> Utilized extensive tools, such as Delphix, SolarWinds, RedGate, ServiceNow, and Attunity, to perform critical operations, including performance tuning, monitoring, and refreshes.
> Successfully migrated 20+ servers from On-Premise to Azure VM (IAAS) cloud independently, ensuring seamless replication of data and zero downtime.
> Received high recognition and appreciation from clients for exceptional work, quality deliverables, and effective communication.
> Developed and implemented robust backup and recovery strategies, database security protocols, and disaster recovery plans to minimize risk and maintain data integrity.
> Delivered full life cycle support for SQL server and database management, including conducting assessments, installations, creations, decommissions, and migrations.
> Led by example, setting high standards for performance, ethics, and professionalism.

experiences.title: Systems Engineer
experiences.description:
> Administered, monitored, and optimized SQL and Azure Server environments, ensuring maximum efficiency and system availability.
> Orchestrated numerous database refreshes from production environment to other lower environments, ensuring seamless replication of critical data.
> Troubleshot and resolved database issues, ensuring quick resolution of problems and minimal downtime for end-users.
> Monitored and managed database performance, using built-in tools and custom scripts to proactively identify and resolve potential issues.
> Utilized database partitioning and compression techniques to optimize database performance and storage utilization.
> Automated database administration tasks using scripts and tools such as PowerShell and SQL Server Agent, increasing efficiency and reducing manual effort.
> Contributed to cross-functional teams and project management methodologies such as Agile and Waterfall, delivering successful database projects on time and within budget.
> Demonstrated deep understanding of database architecture, including storage and memory management, and experience with storage solutions such as SAN and NAS.

accomplishment_honors_awards.description: Earned recognition for outstanding performance by being awarded again with the prestigious Infosys Quarterly Award 'INSTA' in December 2020, a title of best performer in the Unit for three consecutive quarters, a testament to my consistent high-level contributions.

recommendations:
Barry Banhagel



I highly recommend Adarsh and would be happy to serve as a professional reference for him. 
He was valuable resource for our MS SQL Server DBA team. 
Technically, he is knowledgeble and capable to fully understand the issues as well as the implications of changes. 
Adarsh served on our small team to provide 24x7 Support and was always willing to go the extra mile to contribute to the team's success.

Zyadh Coorbanally



Adarsh joined my team as a Database Consultant. He ramped up very quickly on our Database systems as well as our technical processes and business context.

Despite being a relatively young DBA his solid technical knowledge on SQL Server, his curiosity, and organized way of working made him a perfect fit in our organisation.

Adarsh was given several complex tasks and projects such as Database upgrades and migration, and Database performance tuning and optimisation and he delivered all of them successfully.

Besides his technical skills Adarsh is a very good listener, understands client requirements but will never hesitate to propose any recommendations if needed. He's also a very good team player and all our teams enjoyed collaborating with him. He's got very good potential to take up even bigger challenges and I strongly recommend him.
